required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: COMbination of Clopidogrel and Aspirin for Prevention of Early REcurrence in Acute Atherothrombotic Stroke
clinical_study.official_title: COMbination of Clopidogrel and Aspirin for Prevention of REcurrence in Acute Atherothrombotic Stroke Study: Prospective, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Multicenter Trial

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with new ischemic lesions after the onset of acute atherothrombotic stroke
primary_outcome.time_frame: Within 30 days following the onset of acute atherothrombotic stroke

secondary_outcome.measure: Distribution of Modified Rankin Scale (mRS) scores
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 30 after the onset of acute atherothrombotic stroke

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with non-fatal stroke, myocardial infarction (MI) or cardiovascular death (composite endpoint, first-ever)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within 30 days following the onset of acute atherothrombotic stroke

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with stroke (all kinds)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within 30 days following the onset of acute atherothrombotic stroke

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with bleeding episode (major or minor)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within 30 days following the onset of acute atherothrombotic stroke

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with symptomatic intracerebral hemorrhage (ICH)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within 30 days following the onset of acute atherothrombotic stroke

arm_group.description: Administration of Aspirin + Clopidogrel for 30 days
Administration of Aspirin + Clopidogrel placebo for 30 days

intervention.description: Matching tablet, oral administration once daily
